description: Having been subjected to some of the most extreme anal action ever captured on camera, you’d be forgiven for thinking that the young submissive pairing of James Oakleigh and David Luca would be ready to hit the shower and head home; but whether they want to or not, their horny, tattooed master has other ideas. Indeed, he’s very much far from finished; as he proceeds to unleash the kind of no-holds-barred onslaught that would have most lads crying out for their mothers! No such reaction from James and David, however - although the fact that they’ve both got ball-gags in their mouths might explain that one! All the same, the look on their faces is such that you can tell they’re enjoying every fucking second of nipple torment, electro-play, butt-stretching, and hot waxing that the fiendishly wicked dom throws at them. One thing’s for sure - what you get to see here ain’t gonna be everyone’s cup of tea. But for those with a more extreme taste, this is a truly exquisite display of one human being pushing his charges to their limits - and beyond! All fabulously topped off by the sight of the two guys taking it in turns to unleash a volley of jizz as a satisfying “thank you!”
title: Nipple torment, electro, hot wax!
